content:
# I successfully crafted one stone furnace, and my inventory now reflects that I have 1 stone furnace, 10 coal, and 5 stone remaining.
# Next, I need to place the stone furnace in a suitable location to begin processing resources.

# I will find a valid position to place the stone furnace. 
# Since I have coal, I can also start smelting iron ore once I gather it. 

# First, I will locate a nearby iron ore patch.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore resource patch.
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore patch to harvest it.
print(f"Moving to iron ore position: {iron_ore_position}")  # Confirm the movement to the iron ore patch.
